docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 19 (AP).-- The United States Chamber of Commerce today reported that imports from Argentina increased 49 per cent in the first quarter of this year over the same period in 1938, while exports to that country decreased 49 per cent.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 19 (AP).-- The United States Chamber of Commerce today reported that imports from Argentina increased 49 per cent in the first quarter of this year over the same period in 1938, while exports to that country decreased 49 per cent.
